"ha ehenam yamuko,habayi tikak dura payin yanna ooni,kamak nane " kiyala adala bas nawathumen bassa.ethana loku handiyak.kochchara wela yayida payin yanna kiyala ahaddi menna ishan kiyanawa winadi 45k withara yanna oonelu.ehenam thri wil wala yamu kiyala ,thri roda ratha 3k aragena api dan yanawa ishanlage gedara.mage appe ehema yamak.thri wila ekema giya winadi thihak.parata thara dalath na.wala godali emata.walawal wala wati wati gassi, gassi wangu sahitha paraka oya wage gamanak winadi 30k yanakota danena sanipe ithin amuthuwen kiyanna ooni nane.api maga digata katha wune me pare winadi 45kin payin yanawa aththe ishan duwa duwa wenna athi kiyala.

ratath, sambuddha shasanayath wenuwen janadhipathi itu karamin sitinne udara mehewarak - malwathu anunayaka dimbaulkumbaure wimaladhamma himiyo maha mandira bahara karamin podu janathawa athara sita janathawata sewaya karana janapathi ada ratath, sambuddha shasanayath wenuwen itu karamin sitinne udara mehewarak bawa syamopali mahanikaye malwathu maha wihara parshwaye anunayaka, athipujya dimbaulkumbaure shri saranankara wimaladhammabhidhana anunayaka swamin wahanse prakasha karayi.
